original: Nakusalaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
